content: For release on delivery   8:30 a.m. EDT     October 17, 2014         Perspectives on Inequality and Opportunity from the Survey of Consumer Finances       Remarks by    Janet L. Yellen    Chair    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at the    Conference on Economic Opportunity and Inequality     Federal Reserve Bank of Boston    Boston, Massachusetts        October 17, 2014
